snippet.title: Arena Breakout | Closed Beta is live NOW!
snippet.description:
🚀Arena Breakout CBT is online NOW! 
Comment below and tell us the part you are most excited about.  1 lucky guy will receive a $10 Amazon gift card! 🎁
It's time to break out! 💥💥

Get APK: www.arenabreakout.com
Google Play link: https://arenabreakout.onelink.me/ttXb?af_xp=referral&pid=social

#WinnerTakesAll  #ArenaBreakout

————————————————————————————————————

Arena Breakout is a free-to-play immersive tactical FPS on mobile. Players can enjoy Immersive Gunplay with console-quality graphics and sound on mobile. In the arena, players can customize their own gun with the ultimate Gunsmithing system, decide their gear to fight for fortune, and breakout for the win. Come and join this battle, also a great gamble!

————————————————————————————————————

►More Social Media
Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/ArenaBreakoutMobile
Twitter - https://twitter.com/Arena__Breakout
Instagram - https://instagram.com/arena__breakout/
Tik Tok - https://tiktok.com/@arena_breakout
Discord - https://discord.com/invite/ztuuSVZznf
